game.name: Echoed Realms
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Echoed Realms is a Casual Stylized Fantasy RPG focused on player experience and dynamic gameplay. Play it your way, even if that changes every day.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Echoed Realms is a Casual Stylized Fantasy RPG focused on player experience and dynamic gameplay. Play it your way, even if that changes every day.
